The CS211 contest . The first prelim will be on Thursday, March 7. We'll announce times and places soon. The second prelim will be on Tuesday, April 23. The final exam will cover everything in the course. Course description Course staff CS211 lecture notes CS211 handouts CS211 code samples Gofer Enhance Other Web Servers Course description COM S 211  Computers and Programming (also ENGRD 211) Fall, spring, summer. 3 credits. Credit will not be granted for both COM S 211 and 212. Course staff and office hours Instructor: Hal Perkins, 310 Upson, 255-2352. Teaching assistants: Correction:  Office hours will be held in the TA's office Jeff Foster, 312/314 Upson, 255-1099.
